title: JUNIOR ARCHITECT
description: We are seeking an Architect with 2-5 years experience who is passionate about residential architecture and modern design to join our team.
requirements: High level of proficiency with 3D modeling or BIM software- Revit  or Archicad
You are resourceful, have the ability to work efficiently on multiple projects and keep them organized
Strong conceptual, design and detailing skills
benefits: This is a full time salaried position with health insurance, paid vacation, sick leave and holidays. Salary starts at $65,000 and is commensurate with experience and skill set.

A flexible and open attitude towards various ways of working, and a commitment to excellence
benefits: This is a full time salaried position with health insurance, paid vacation, sick leave and holidays. Salary starts at $65,000 and is commensurate with experience and skill set.

title: Civil Engineer
